name: Rest API Postman
description: Project for Test cases rest api

scripts.api-tests-v1: newman run newman run tests/DemoNewRestApiV1.postman_collection.json -e tests/OnPremise.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,htmlextra,junit --reporter-junit-export newman/newman.xml --reporter-htmlextra-export newman/newman.html
scripts.api-tests-old: newman run newman run tests/DemoOldRestApi.postman_collection.json -e tests/OnPremise.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,htmlextra,junit --reporter-junit-export newman/newman.xml --reporter-htmlextra-export newman/newman.html

author: Noelia
